town_gossip_barber.title: Barber & Listener
town_gossip_barber.description: A cheerful barber who remembers every face, every feud, and every secret that walks through town—whether you meant to share it or not.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The barber shop is dark—Harlan’s gone ‘for supplies’.

town_deputy_green.title: Deputy
town_deputy_green.description: New badge, old bruises. Green is earnest, underpaid, and desperately trying to keep a lid on a town that keeps boiling over.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Deputy Green is out chasing a lead.

town_stablehand_tess.title: Stablehand
town_stablehand_tess.description: Smells like hay and honest work. Tess sees who arrives, who leaves, and who lies about where they’ve been.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The stables are quiet—Tess is out chasing a runaway.

town_prospector_old_jed.title: Retired Prospector
town_prospector_old_jed.description: Gold fever burned out years ago, but Jed still talks like the next ridge holds salvation. Sometimes he’s even right.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Jed wandered off toward the hills again.

town_schoolmarm_ivy.title: Schoolmarm
town_schoolmarm_ivy.description: Writes like a blade and speaks like a sermon. Ivy collects books, debts, and the names of people who ‘owe the town better.’

schedule.unavailable_reason: Class is in session; Ivy does not like interruptions.

town_map_surveyor_oneeye.title: Surveyor
town_map_surveyor_oneeye.description: Obsessed with maps and angles. Oren claims the land is shifting—subtly, slowly, and with intent.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Oren is out measuring something that ‘shouldn’t be there.’

town_widow_emberhouse.title: Widow of Emberhouse
town_widow_emberhouse.description: Lives beside a burned ruin she refuses to abandon. Maris speaks softly, but her grief has teeth.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Maris won’t open the door tonight.

town_drunk_poet.title: Drunk Poet
town_drunk_poet.description: Recites prophecy between insults and apologies. Calder’s words are mostly nonsense—until they aren’t.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Calder’s asleep somewhere inconvenient.

town_midwife_sable.title: Midwife
town_midwife_sable.description: A steady hand in desperate moments. Sable knows everyone’s family business—because she helped bring it into the world.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Sable is out on a house call.

fort_sentry_bored.title: Sentry
fort_sentry_bored.description: Bored enough to talk, disciplined enough to stop when it matters. Wills knows what goes in and out of the fort—officially and otherwise.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Wills has been rotated to the outer watch.

fort_drill_instructor.title: Drill Instructor
fort_drill_instructor.description: A voice like gravel in a tin can. Brant has a talent for finding weakness and calling it by name.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Brant is drilling recruits until sundown.

fort_veteran_missing_records.title: Veteran
fort_veteran_missing_records.description: Wears the uniform like a question. Corin’s unit records are ‘lost,’ and they’d very much like them found.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Corin’s been called in for ‘questions’ again.

fort_chaplain_doubt.title: Chaplain
fort_chaplain_doubt.description: Offers comfort with a steady voice—and carries doubts like contraband. Rowe hears confessions people don’t want to admit they made.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Rowe is tending to someone who needs it more.

fort_intel_officer.title: Intelligence Officer
fort_intel_officer.description: Collects details the way others collect coins. Varren is polite, precise, and never tells you what they already know.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The lieutenant is in briefing.

trading_post_freight_clerk.title: Freight Clerk
trading_post_freight_clerk.description: Ink-stained fingers and iron patience. Mina can tell you what’s missing before you know it’s gone.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Mina is reconciling a manifest and will not be rushed.

trading_post_route_planner.title: Route Planner
trading_post_route_planner.description: Knows which trails are safe, which are fast, and which are lying. Kerris sells information in ‘friendly advice.’

schedule.unavailable_reason: Kerris is meeting with a caravan captain.

trading_post_caravan_guard.title: Caravan Guard
trading_post_caravan_guard.description: Stands where trouble is most likely to arrive. Rusk gives short answers—unless you mention pay.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Rusk has taken a contract and is already on the trail.

trading_post_interpreter.title: Interpreter
trading_post_interpreter.description: Speaks too many languages and trusts too few people. Sera can smooth a deal—or sharpen it into a weapon.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Sera is translating for someone who pays better.

trading_post_disgraced_merchant.title: Disgraced Merchant
trading_post_disgraced_merchant.description: Once rich, now bitter. Bram knows who cheats on the trail—because he used to.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Bram is ‘busy’ with the wrong crowd.

mission_abbess.title: Abbess
mission_abbess.description: Kind voice, uncompromising gaze. Mother Ysabel offers forgiveness freely—but expects effort in return.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The abbess is in prayer with the congregation.

mission_archivist.title: Archivist
mission_archivist.description: Guards old papers like they’re loaded guns. Carden says some truths were buried for good reasons.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The archive is closed—Carden is cataloging something delicate.

mission_penitent_outlaw.title: Penitent
mission_penitent_outlaw.description: Former outlaw, current ghost of a person. Joss wants absolution—but keeps looking over their shoulder like it has a price.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Joss has slipped away to be alone.

mission_visionary_mystic.title: Visionary
mission_visionary_mystic.description: Speaks in symbols and sleeps in daylight. Lume’s ‘visions’ are unsettlingly specific for pure faith.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Lume won’t speak until the candles are lit.

caravan_leader.title: Caravan Leader
caravan_leader.description: Keeps people alive with ruthless logistics. Rell hires help reluctantly—and fires it without hesitation.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Captain Rell is negotiating with another crew.

caravan_cook.title: Camp Cook
caravan_cook.description: Feeds a dozen tempers a day and calls it love. Poppy hears everything around the fire.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The cookfire is out—Poppy’s asleep.

caravan_animal_handler.title: Animal Handler
caravan_animal_handler.description: Speaks to beasts better than people. Bramble can tell if trouble’s near by how the animals breathe.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Bramble’s out checking the herd.

caravan_star_reader.title: Star-Reader
caravan_star_reader.description: Reads the sky like a ledger and smiles like it’s a joke. Moth’s ‘predictions’ have a habit of being right in the worst ways.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Moth won’t read the sky while it’s bright.

roadhouse_gambler.title: Gambler
roadhouse_gambler.description: Wins with charm, loses with grace, and lies with artistry. Juno’s rumors are expensive—if not in coin, then in consequence.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Juno is at a private table.

roadhouse_musician.title: Musician
roadhouse_musician.description: Plays songs that feel like they’re about you—until you realize they’re about everyone. Lark trades gossip like chords.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Lark’s voice is gone—no songs tonight.

roadhouse_fixer.title: Fixer
roadhouse_fixer.description: Arranges meetings, solves problems, creates new ones. Etta smiles like a contract and never stops working.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Etta is in a back room with someone important.

roadhouse_drifter.title: Drifter
roadhouse_drifter.description: Looks like he’s been walking since before the road existed. Sam knows places the map refuses to admit.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Sam’s vanished—like he does.

roadhouse_debt_collector.title: Debt Collector
roadhouse_debt_collector.description: Polite, patient, and terrifyingly reasonable. Kade never raises his voice—he doesn’t need to.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Kade is ‘handling business’ elsewhere.

cave_hermit.title: Hermit
cave_hermit.description: A person who has decided the world is too loud. Hush knows the cave’s moods and the things that shouldn’t be waking inside it.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Hush won’t show himself tonight.

cave_trapped_explorer.title: Trapped Explorer
cave_trapped_explorer.description: Scraped, stubborn, and running out of light. Nora swears there’s a second way out—if you can find it.

schedule.unavailable_reason: No sign of life—only dripping stone.

cave_relic_guardian.title: Relic Guardian
cave_relic_guardian.description: A presence more than a person. It offers bargains in silence and punishes impatience with certainty.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The cave is quiet—too quiet.

cave_cult_remnant.title: Cult Remnant
cave_cult_remnant.description: A survivor with ash under their nails. Sable Thread speaks in half-truths and watches your shadow more than your face.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Only footprints—no person.

town_common_laborer.title: Laborer
town_common_laborer.description: Works hard, laughs harder. Moss has seen every kind of traveler, and he judges them by how they treat people who can’t fight back.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Moss is out on a job.

town_courier.title: Courier
town_courier.description: Always in a hurry, always listening. Rin knows which roads are ‘safe’ and which are merely unclaimed.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Rin is already on the road.

town_land_agent.title: Land Agent
town_land_agent.description: Sells deeds, sells futures, sells lies. Cyrus speaks politely while stealing the ground from under your feet.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Cyrus is meeting ‘investors’.

fort_card_table_rumors.title: Card Player
fort_card_table_rumors.description: A soldier who talks too much when the cards go bad. Senn’s rumors are half true and fully contagious.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The card table is empty tonight.

fort_scout_captain.title: Scout Captain
fort_scout_captain.description: Leads patrols into places maps don’t like. Nix hires capable people and watches them like a hawk.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Captain Nix is out beyond the wire.

trading_post_smuggling_investigator.title: Inspector
trading_post_smuggling_investigator.description: Wears plain clothes and a sharper suspicion. Kess asks questions until the answers start sweating.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Kess is tailing someone.

mission_pilgrim_guide.title: Pilgrim Guide
mission_pilgrim_guide.description: Knows the old paths and the old prayers. Toma can get you to holy ground—if you can survive the walk.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Toma is leading a small group today.

caravan_storyteller.title: Storyteller
caravan_storyteller.description: Tells tales like he’s paying rent with them. Brine’s rumors arrive wrapped in jokes and leave wrapped in dread.

schedule.unavailable_reason: No one’s telling stories tonight.

roadhouse_silent_cardsharp.title: Cardsharp
roadhouse_silent_cardsharp.description: Plays without looking at her hand. People say she cheats. People also say she doesn’t need to.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Mira isn’t playing tonight.

roadhouse_ex_lawman.title: Ex-Lawman
roadhouse_ex_lawman.description: A badge-shaped scar in the way he stands. Grady keeps to the corner and notices everything.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Grady’s gone for a walk.

town_unusual_former_outlaw.title: Reformed Outlaw
town_unusual_former_outlaw.description: Trying to live straight in a world that bends. Vera offers help the way she used to offer trouble: directly.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Vera won’t be seen tonight.

trading_post_trader_refuses_coin.title: Barter Traditionalist
trading_post_trader_refuses_coin.description: Refuses coin on principle—then sells you the principle for coin. Hobb’s logic is a maze with a smile at the center.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Hobb is ‘negotiating’ with someone stubborn.

fort_courtmartial_officer.title: Disgraced Officer
fort_courtmartial_officer.description: Stripped of command but not of pride. Orlov wants redemption—on his terms, and with someone else taking the risk.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Orlov refuses visitors right now.

mission_confessor.title: Confessor
mission_confessor.description: Hears sins like weather and never looks shocked. Mave offers gentle words and sharp questions in equal measure.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Confession is closed for now.

caravan_rival_envoy.title: Rival Envoy
caravan_rival_envoy.description: Smiles like a knife being sheathed. Venn offers deals that always have a second meaning.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Venn has moved on to another campfire.

roadhouse_performer_occult.title: Performer
roadhouse_performer_occult.description: Sings hymns that don’t belong to any church you’ve heard of. People leave her shows with tears, coins, or both.

schedule.unavailable_reason: No performance tonight—only silence.

town_ranch_hand.title: Ranch Hand
town_ranch_hand.description: Knows animals, weather, and which fences were cut on purpose. Pax speaks slow, thinks fast.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Pax is out mending fences.

fort_prisoner_liaison.title: Prisoner Liaison
fort_prisoner_liaison.description: Handles prisoners and paperwork with the same cold efficiency. Sloane can make problems disappear—if you can afford the moral cost.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Sloane is dealing with ‘an incident’.

trading_post_drover.title: Drover
trading_post_drover.description: Smells like dust and determination. Kip knows where the herds move and why the trails sometimes go quiet.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Kip is out with the animals.

mission_groundkeeper.title: Groundskeeper
mission_groundkeeper.description: Tends the garden like it’s a battlefield. Rowan has seen miracles, and he doesn’t trust most of them.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Rowan is out tending the grounds.

caravan_night_watch.title: Night Watch
caravan_night_watch.description: Eyes like lanterns in the dark. Sparrow hears the desert talk—footsteps, whispers, and the silence between them.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Sparrow is making rounds beyond the firelight.

roadhouse_dice_runner.title: Dice Runner
roadhouse_dice_runner.description: Moves between tables like a rumor with legs. Tink can introduce you to anyone—if you pay in favors.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Tink is busy running a game.

town_rumor_laundress.title: Laundress
town_rumor_laundress.description: Washes blood out of cloth and lies out of people. Mara hears more than anyone suspects—and forgets nothing important.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Mara’s closed up for the day.

fort_bureaucrat.title: Records Clerk
fort_bureaucrat.description: Paperwork given human form. Danton can solve problems instantly—as long as you have the right stamp, the right signature, and the right patience.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The clerk’s window is closed.

trading_post_rumor_caravanner.title: Caravanner
trading_post_rumor_caravanner.description: Lives on the road and talks like it. Gwen’s rumors come with mileage and a warning label.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Gwen’s caravan has already rolled out.

mission_relic_seeker.title: Relic Seeker
mission_relic_seeker.description: Believes the old world left gifts behind—if you’re worthy, or desperate. Santos hires muscle and prays it won’t be needed.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Santos is preparing for a pilgrimage.

caravan_wheel_chronicler.title: Chronicler
caravan_wheel_chronicler.description: Carves symbols into wagon wheels and claims they keep the bad luck moving. Glyph records everything—especially what others omit.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Glyph has gone to carve somewhere quieter.

roadhouse_rumor_waitress.title: Server
roadhouse_rumor_waitress.description: Carries drinks, collects stories. Nia knows who’s lying because she hears them repeat the lie twice.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Nia’s off shift.

cave_survivor_prisoner.title: Survivor
cave_survivor_prisoner.description: Looks like he crawled out of the dark with it still inside him. Eli will talk—if you keep your voice low and your light lower.

schedule.unavailable_reason: No sign of Eli—only scuffed stone.

trainer_old_pete.title: Master Gunsmith
trainer_old_pete.description: A legendary gunfighter turned gunsmith. His hands shake now, but his eye is still sharp. He teaches those with coin and patience.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Pete's working on a commission—come back later.

trainer_sgt_morrison.title: Cavalry Instructor
trainer_sgt_morrison.description: A grizzled cavalry veteran who's survived more battles than he can count. He trains soldiers—and the occasional civilian who proves their worth.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The Sergeant is drilling recruits.

trainer_silent_fox.title: Wilderness Guide
trainer_silent_fox.description: A native scout who knows every trail and trick for surviving the frontier. She takes on students when the mood strikes—and the price is right.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Silent Fox has left for the hills.

trainer_diamond_dan.title: Professional Gambler
trainer_diamond_dan.description: A sharply dressed card shark who's been run out of every major city. He'll teach you his tricks—for the right price.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Dan's in a private game—don't interrupt.

trainer_dr_cross.title: Army Surgeon
trainer_dr_cross.description: A skilled surgeon who's patched up more gunshot wounds than she'd like to remember. She teaches field medicine to those with steady hands.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Dr. Cross is in surgery.

trainer_mama_eulalia.title: Swamp Witch
trainer_mama_eulalia.description: An ancient woman of mysterious origins. Some say she's been here since before the war. She only teaches those who've proven themselves.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Only echoes answer your call.

trainer_mission_padre.title: Mission Elder
trainer_mission_padre.description: An old priest who has walked with saints and sinners alike. He teaches inner peace and the strength that comes from it.

schedule.unavailable_reason: The Padre is in silent prayer.

trainer_caravan_master.title: Caravan Veteran
trainer_caravan_master.description: Twenty years on the trails have taught him everything about surviving the long haul. He shares his knowledge with those who can keep up.

schedule.unavailable_reason: Hicks is inspecting the wagons.
